comments_since_last_sample.body: Nah, if you STOMP the enemy team and say "GOOD GAME" that just adds insult to injury. If the losing team says it first okay, but coming from the winning team it's absolutely BM.
I also say GG after and the amount of times i get "fuck you" in response is ridiculous.

They said GG. 
But it wasn't GG. 
It was BG.
We?
Only see this on quake champions servers.

GG = my brain: “respect”
GGEZ = my brain: “fuck this guy”
writing gg on winning side is giga BM
sounds pretty toxic to me
What's GG? Get Good?
Na hit them with the good ol “tryhards get out of your moms basement”
EZ Mid

Idk what games you're playing but gg is usually percieved as having a negative connotation. We are behind halfway through the game, your teamates: "gg end pls" guy sucks all game but gets carried: "gg ez noobs" guy loses the game: "gg no team"
Nothing like some good sportsmanship :)
"EZ EZ EZ EZ EZ AS EASY AS YOUR MOM!" - every league game..
GGEZ
I know what GG means but what is WP?
It is really nice when that happens instead of a 9yr screaming EZ into the mic

I hold this sentiment as well, unfortunately I feel like it isn’t he norm these days :(.

Refreshing to see this stuff tho!
Is this meme the first and only non porn sfm video?
And then one guy spams „ezez“
BM GGs are still a thing and it is so frustrating when you're getting your ass beat and they still say gg like you actually put up a challenge lol.
EZ
Of course they will say gg (if they know who Atreus' dad is)

The winning team saying GG at the end is like icing on the cake for them. No shit it was a good game, they won! However If you lose and say GG that is true sportsmanship. Which is something I hardly ever see.
As a primary SoT player these are 100% the best fights.
“GG” can turn from friendly to toxic if you add “EZ” to it.
I'm complete opposite. If my team gets completely stomped and its not a game at all, and the enemy still goes "gg". That shit tilts the complete fuck out of me and that is their goal by saying it.
For sure it's League of Legends
I always say GG in Dead By Daylight. Whether I stomp them for a 32K game or they stomp and all escape.
We’re out here making the world a better place one GG at a time
Friki 2.0
GG ez
When does this EVER happen. The online gaming community is toxic AF.
In CSGO you'll get so much abuse from the other team (and your team mates) and then as soon as the game finishes it's all "GG WP" as if they weren't wishing you dead 5 minutes before hand!
I always try to say ggwp so the other team knows they did well
